title: Vida 2013A with patch, instructions and Dice software
description:
Works fine on my Windows 7 Ultimate 64bits with internet explorer 8 installed.
Skype can interference with Vida software...

Ive included drivers for CP2102 dice-unit.
Also a patch for Vadis.

Please read all instructions when installing, and it should be all ok.

Use 7-zip to unzip.
___

To install Volvo ViDA you MUST have AT LEAST & MINIMUM these:

1. PC with Core Duo +
2. 3GB RAM + (From 2012D Release the RAM limit CHANGED!)
   BUT you can patch this! Please read the related .txt about "How To"...
3. HDD or SDD with 40GB FREE Size +
4. Internet Explorer 8 ONLY!

About OS:
WinXP Professional + SP3
Win Vista ANY Version EXCEPT Home / Premium!
Win 7 ANY Version EXCEPT Home / Premium!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Advice/Tip's: Try to NOT install ViDA along with ANY other Automotive S/W!
              Also DO NOT Install along with ViDA, ANY Skype Version! DON'T!
              ViDA has strange conflict with Skype and ALWAYS you will
              watching the ViDA Monitor = YELLOW!
----------------------------------------------------------------------------


1. At the end of your Installation about ViDA Configurator choose: VCC Intranet!
   Then "Save" and then "Close"

2. Finish your Installation

3. Reboot your Computer!!! THIS IS VERY IMPORTANT!!!

4. On Windows log-on, Copy/Paste the Patch in your C: Drive (In the ROOT!)

-----------------------------------------------------------------
   NOTE: IF Vida is installed using OTHER Drive Letter such D: or E: and so on,
         you must enter vida installation destination when opening patcher from C:! 
-----------------------------------------------------------------

5. In your Task Bar DISABLE your ViDA Service Monitor (from green you must watching RED after this!)
   Then EXIT (Right click > Close) the ViDA Service Monitor!

6. Now run the Patch from your C: Drive (If patch folder is missing during patching, copy PATCH folder:
(\Volvo ViDA 2013A Patch & instructionsVolvo ViDA 2013A Patch & instructionsVolvo ViDA 2013A PatchPATCH)
to vida installation folder and try again.

7. Wait until you will watch the ViDA Service Monitor from Yellow ---> Green!

8. Now go to your main ViDA Installation folder C:VIDA and rename the:
   wslLogin.exe to > wslLogin_OFF.exe for example...

9. When the ViDA Monitor comes Green, run from your Desktop Vida-All-In-One

10. IE opening and now for ViDA Access: Read the Access Details .txt
